Changelog
---------

0.2.2 (2017-08-29)
++++++++++++++++++
* Appropriately handle `.filter_is_sticky`

0.2.1 (2017-07-13)
++++++++++++++++++
* Recognize OneToOne fields as singular related fields

0.2.0 (2017-07-13)
++++++++++++++++++
* Add support for many to many fields
* Restructure the backend to be more extensible

0.1.0 (2017-04-17)
++++++++++++++++++

* First PyPI release.
